attributes.action: Continue Stephen Toope's daily emails beyond the coronavirus crisis
attributes.additional_details: We, and many other students, find that the comfort provided by Stephen Toope's emails is unparalleled, and that it is therefore highly beneficial for the welfare of the student body.
attributes.background: In these trying and uncertain times, Stephen Toope has been a reliable source of information and comfort for students. We believe that these "Daily Update" emails should be continued beyond the coronavirus crisis and be a part of daily student life.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
